fallback_recipes.title: Simple Pasta with Garlic and Olive Oil
fallback_recipes.summary: A classic Italian pasta dish that's simple, delicious, and perfect when external recipe APIs are unavailable.
fallback_recipes.instructions: 1. Cook pasta according to package directions. 2. Heat olive oil in a large pan. 3. Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant. 4. Toss cooked pasta with garlic oil. 5. Season with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes. 6. Serve with grated Parmesan cheese.

fallback_recipes.title: Basic Green Salad
fallback_recipes.summary: A fresh and healthy salad that's perfect as a side dish or light meal.
fallback_recipes.instructions: 1. Wash and dry mixed greens. 2. Slice cucumber and tomatoes. 3. Combine vegetables in a large bowl. 4. Whisk together olive oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper for dressing. 5. Toss salad with dressing just before serving.

fallback_recipes.title: Scrambled Eggs
fallback_recipes.summary: Perfect scrambled eggs that are creamy and delicious.
fallback_recipes.instructions: 1. Crack eggs into a bowl and whisk with salt and pepper. 2. Heat butter in a non-stick pan over medium-low heat. 3. Pour in eggs and let sit for 20 seconds. 4. Gently stir with a spatula, pushing eggs from edges to center. 5. Continue cooking and stirring until eggs are just set. 6. Remove from heat and serve immediately.

fallback_recipes.title: Rice and Beans
fallback_recipes.summary: A nutritious and filling combination that's a staple in many cuisines around the world.
fallback_recipes.instructions: 1. Cook rice according to package directions. 2. Heat oil in a large pan. 3. Sauté onion and garlic until softened. 4. Add beans, cumin, and paprika. 5. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. 6. Season with salt and pepper. 7. Serve beans over rice.

fallback_recipes.title: Grilled Chicken Breast
fallback_recipes.summary: Simple grilled chicken breast that's healthy and versatile.
fallback_recipes.instructions: 1. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. 2. Season chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and herbs. 3. Brush with olive oil. 4. Grill for 6-7 minutes per side until internal temperature reaches 165°F. 5. Let rest for 5 minutes before slicing. 6. Serve with your favorite sides.

metadata.description: Basic recipes for fallback scenarios when external APIs are unavailable
